short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Picker Chrome extension addon lets you to pick color from any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ultimate tool for web designers and developers with our Color Picker Chrome extension. This powerful extension features an intuitive eyedropper tool, allowing you to easily pick any color from any website. Whether you're working on a new design or need to match a specific hue, our extension simplifies the process.

Key Features:

⚡️Eyedropper Tool: Instantly pick any color from any webpage with precision.
⚡️Popup Color Picker: Select and adjust colors directly within the extension's popup.
⚡️Color History: Keep track of your recently picked colors for easy access.
⚡️Hex, RGB, and HSL Values: View and copy color codes in multiple formats.

Our Color Picker extension is designed to improve your workflow and ensure color consistency across your projects. Perfect for designers, developers, and anyone who works with colors. Install now and experience seamless color selection!
